errors.error_description: The README fails to specify the required Python version (3.7+), stating only 'Python 3', which can lead to compatibility errors if an older, unsupported version is used.
correction_candidates: To install it, first set up a [Python virtual environment](...) with Python 3.7+.
To install it, first set up a [Python virtual environment](...) with the latest Python 3 version.
To install it, first set up a [Python virtual environment](...) with Python > 3.6.
To install it, first set up a [Python virtual environment](...) with Python >= 3.7.
errors.golden_answer: To install it, first set up a [Python virtual environment](...) with Python 3.7+.
